gettingStarted.title: Welcome to KriptoLab!
gettingStarted.introduction1: KriptoLab is a beginner-friendly Crypto Trading Simulator that allows you to practice trading using real market data from Indodax without any financial risk.
gettingStarted.introduction2: This guide will walk you through setting up your account and getting started. By the end of this tutorial, you'll be able to:
gettingStarted.createAccountDesc: Start your KriptoLab journey by creating a free account to save your progress and begin trading.
gettingStarted.createAccountStep1: Go to the KriptoLab website and locate the Register button in the top-right corner.
gettingStarted.createAccountStep2: Fill out the registration form with:
gettingStarted.createAccountStep3: Click the Create Account button to complete registration.
gettingStarted.createAccountField3: A secure password (minimum 8 characters, including uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and special characters)
gettingStarted.alternativeStep2: Select the Google account you want to use.
gettingStarted.alternativeStep3: Follow the prompted steps to complete your registration.
gettingStarted.loginDesc: Access your KriptoLab account and start your trading simulation.
gettingStarted.loginStep1: Click the Login button in the top-right corner.
gettingStarted.loginStep2: Enter your registered email and password.
gettingStarted.loginStep3: Click the Login button to access your account.
gettingStarted.forgotPasswordTitle: Forgot Your Password? Follow these steps:
gettingStarted.forgotStep1: On the login page, click the Forgot Password link.
gettingStarted.forgotStep4: Check your email inbox (including spam folder) for the reset link.
gettingStarted.forgotStep5: Click the reset link and create a new password.
gettingStarted.exploreDesc: Now that you're set up, explore KriptoLab and begin your crypto trading simulation.
gettingStarted.exploreLink2: Start Trading with Real Market Data

marketOverview.title: Explore the Market Overview
marketOverview.introduction1: The Market Overview is the central hub of KriptoLab, providing live cryptocurrency prices, trending assets, and comprehensive market insights to help you make informed trading decisions.
marketOverview.introduction2: In this tutorial, you'll learn how to:
marketOverview.listingsDesc: The Market Listings table provides comprehensive real-time data for all supported cryptocurrency assets.
marketOverview.listingsStep1: Navigate to the Market page from the main navigation menu.
marketOverview.listingsStep2: Explore the Market Listings Table with key information about crypto assets:
marketOverview.listingsField2: Token Pair: Available trading pairs (e.g., BTC/IDR, ETH/IDR)
marketOverview.listingsField4: 24h Volume: Total trading volume in last 24 hours
marketOverview.listingsField5: 24h Change: Price percentage change in 24 hours
marketOverview.listingsField6: 7d Change: Price percentage change in 7 days
marketOverview.filtersDesc: Easily locate and explore cryptocurrencies using KriptoLab's advanced filtering tools.
marketOverview.filtersStep1: Use the Search Bar to find specific cryptocurrencies:
marketOverview.filtersField1: Located at the top of the Market Listings Table
marketOverview.filtersField2: Enter a token name or ticker (e.g., BTC)
marketOverview.filtersField3: Table updates to show matching results
marketOverview.filtersField4: Click the "Trending" button above the table
marketOverview.filtersField5: View top-performing and most popular assets
marketOverview.detailsDesc: The Market Detail Page offers in-depth analysis and trading simulation for each cryptocurrency.
marketOverview.detailsField1: Click on any cryptocurrency in the Market Listings Table
marketOverview.detailsField2: Access comprehensive information for the selected asset
marketOverview.detailsField3: Zoom in/out to examine different timeframes
marketOverview.detailsField4: Hover over chart points for precise price details
marketOverview.nextStepsTitle: Next Steps in Your Trading Journey
marketOverview.nextStepsDesc: You've now mastered the Market Overview! Continue exploring KriptoLab:

tradingGuide.title: How to Start Trading in KriptoLab
tradingGuide.introduction: Learn how to buy and sell cryptocurrencies in KriptoLab using real market data from Indodax. Simulate trades with no risk and experience how fees work in a real-world trading environment!
tradingGuide.depositDesc: Before trading, you need to deposit an IDR balance into your simulated wallet. Here's how:
tradingGuide.depositStep1: Click the Balance in the top-right corner of the website or navigate to the Portfolio page.
tradingGuide.depositStep3: Enter the deposit amount you want to add to your balance.
tradingGuide.depositNote: Once done, your IDR balance will be updated, and you're ready to start trading.
tradingGuide.selectPairDesc: Choose the crypto token you want to buy or sell in the Marketplace.
tradingGuide.selectPairStep2: Browse or search for your desired trading pair (e.g., BTC/IDR).
tradingGuide.selectPairStep3: Click on the pair to open the Market Detail Page.
tradingGuide.buyDesc: Follow these steps to buy crypto using your IDR balance.
tradingGuide.buyStep1: On the Market Detail Page, locate the Buy Section.
tradingGuide.buyStep2: Enter the amount of IDR you want to spend or the token amount to purchase.
tradingGuide.buyStep3: Use quick percentage options (25%, 50%, 75%, 100%) to auto-calculate the trade.
tradingGuide.buyStep4: Click Confirm Buy to place the order.
tradingGuide.buyNote: A small fee will be deducted from your trade to simulate real Indodax fees.
tradingGuide.sellDesc: Here's how to sell crypto back to IDR balance:
tradingGuide.sellStep1: On the Market Detail Page, locate the Sell Section.
tradingGuide.sellStep2: Enter the token amount you want to sell or the amount of IDR you want to receive.
tradingGuide.sellStep3: Use quick percentage options (25%, 50%, 75%, 100%) to auto-calculate the trade.
tradingGuide.sellStep4: Click Confirm Sell to place the order.
tradingGuide.sellNote: Similar to buying, a small fee will be applied to simulate trading costs.
tradingGuide.portfolioDesc: After completing your trades, you can check your updated balance and token holdings.
tradingGuide.portfolioStep2: View your token holdings, total IDR balance, and trade summary.
tradingGuide.portfolioStep3: Check transaction history to see all your buy/sell activities.
tradingGuide.summaryDesc: That's it! You've learned how to buy, sell, and track your trades in KriptoLab. Start exploring different pairs and practice your trading strategies risk-free.
tradingGuide.summaryLink2: Track your trades in the Portfolio
